description: Overview* Cable Matters iPhone/iPad/iPod Dock to HDMI Adapter with Built-in Charging Cable offers a simple, convenient, and cost effective solution for putting your slides, movies, photos, and everything else that fills your iPhone/iPad/iPod screen on an even bigger screen via HDMI port.Instructions* Connects iPad/iPhone/iPod to your HDTV using this adapter and an HDMI cable (HDMI cable isNOTincluded in this order)* Select the correct HDMI channel on the HDTV* Plug and play. The adapter charges your device while playing your favorite videos. (Power adapter isNOTincluded in this order)Specifications* Supports iPad 1/2/3, iPhone 4/4S, and iPod 4th generation.* Supports the following apps on iPhone 4 and iPad 1: Movies (iTunes, Netflix), Videos, Photos Slideshow, and YouTube video (both YouTube App and on Safari).* Supports mirroring on iPhone 4S, iPad 2 and iPad 3: Mirror display on iPad and iPhone to HDTV.* Can play back movies that are purchased through iTunes.* Charges your device via built-in charging cable while streaming.* Supports full HD 1080p on iPhone 4S, iPad 2 and iPad 3.* Transmits both video and audio to HDTV* Compatible with iOS 4.x, 5.x, and 6.0* I/O: 30 pin Dock male to 19 pin HDMI female and 5 pin USB male* RoHS compliantImportant Note* This adapter doesNOTwork with Amazon Prime instant video* Does not support mirroring for iPhone4/iPad
title: Cable Matters iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch Dock to HDMI Adapter with Built-in USB Charging Cable
